entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 8:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 8:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
